      • getRule

        public Optional<BuildRule> getRule(SourcePath sourcePath)
        Returns:
        An Optional containing the BuildRule whose output sourcePath refers to, or absent if sourcePath doesn't refer to the output of a BuildRule.

      • getRelativePath

        public Optional<Path> getRelativePath(SourcePath sourcePath)
        Returns:
        An Optional containing the Path the sourcePath refers to if it doesn't refer to the output of a BuildRule, or absent if it does.
